value.string:
Agent: Good Morning, Mr. Sharma. How may I help you today?
Customer: Hi, I have misplaced my credit card and would like to replace it.
Agent: Sure, before I help you with this request, can you please confirm your Account ID for verification purposes?
Customer: Yes, the id is 071103715.
Agent: Thanks, your account has been verified.
Customer: Ok.
Agent: Can you please confirm if you would like to replace your credit card which ends with the digits 8,2,0,4?
Customer: Yes, please.
Agent: Thanks for the confirmation, I am creating a service request for you now.
Customer: Ok.
Agent: You request has been created with ticket number 1035. You will get a confirmation via SMS after this call. Is there anything else I can help with?
Customer: No, that will be all. Thanks.
Agent: Ok, Mr. Sharma, thanks for banking with us. Have a great day!

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments
